meanings.definition: The quality or state of being loud.
meanings.sent1: The loudnesses of the music at the concert made my ears ring.
meanings.sent2: The loudnesses of the thunderstorm could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The loudnesses of the barking dog startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The loudnesses of the city streets never seemed to quiet down.
meanings.sent5: The loudnesses of the fireworks lit up the night sky with sound.

meanings.definition: The degree of intensity or volume of a sound.
meanings.sent1: The loudnesses of the alarm clock woke me up abruptly.
meanings.sent2: The loudnesses of the cheering crowd filled the stadium with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The loudnesses of the chirping birds created a symphony in the park.
meanings.sent4: The loudnesses of the train passing by drowned out our conversation.
meanings.sent5: The loudnesses of the waterfall echoed through the canyon with power.
